sentences.sContent: He played an Irish melody on the harp.
sentences.sContent_eng: He played an Irish melody on the harp.
sentences.sCn: 他用竖琴演奏了一首爱尔兰曲调。

sentences.sContent: She began to harp us to drink after dinner.
sentences.sContent_eng: She began to harp us to drink after dinner.
sentences.sCn: 用餐后，她开始弹奏起竖琴让我们饮酒消食。

sentences.sContent: This is a small harp and a home-made rattle fashioned from a tin that once contained food aid.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a small harp and a home-made rattle fashioned from a tin that once contained food aid.
sentences.sCn: 这是一把小竖琴和一只拨浪鼓--拨浪鼓是由盛放救援粮食的罐头手工改制而成的。
